name: 余盛延
objective: 為什麼要閱讀或研究莎士比亞? Catherine Belsey 回答道：是為了莎翁的獨特性。如她所言：「莎士比亞不僅是英語世界上流社會文化的精華，亦為其整體文化的精髓。」因為莎劇的辭彙，迄今仍通用於英語世界，並已融入日常生活之結構中。這現象不僅發生在現在的英國，自莎翁的時代開始，莎翁的語彙在全世界就從未停止流通過。何況，莎翁震撼人心的詩歌和劇場藝術，無人出其右的人性掌握，以及非凡的人生哲學思維與洞見，向來受到世人的珍愛。如世人常謂：莎士比亞的語言可觸發我們的想像力，為我們在人生的各個層面(包括職業層面)提升溝通效率。為了這些重要的理由，本課程將引導學生欣賞莎士比亞的若干劇作。

scorePolicy:
Grading policy:
Attendance and class performance: 30%, oral presentation: 30%, position papers: 40%
materials:
Requirements
Readings:
Books: All refer to annotated editions that provide useful background information, a performance history, and invaluable notes.
Hamlet (Norton Critical Edition)
King Lear (Arden Shakespeare)
Othello (Arden Shakespeare)
Macbeth (New Cambridge Shakespeare)

Oral presentation:
You are required to deliver two oral presentations: one on a particular play and the other on your position paper, which usually focus on some controversial issues in and about the texts you have read. For the presentation on a particular play, you may concentrate on any aspect of the play chosen (a scene, an act, an issue, a problem, a dramatic element, a dramatic convention, a dramatic device, a theme, etc.) and discuss it in relation to the play and/or all of the four plays. For the presentation on your position paper, you will be given 15 minutes for the task and leave 4 minutes for discussion. The length of the position paper is 4-5 pages. For detailed advice on writing a position paper, you may consult this website: http://web.ceu.hu/writing/position.htm.
